meanings.definition: To make a commitment or pledge
meanings.sent1: She will eng to always help her friends.
meanings.sent2: He decided to eng to exercise every day.
meanings.sent3: After much thought, he finally eng to join the club.
meanings.sent4: Her heart enged to support those in need.
meanings.sent5: The team captain enged to lead by example.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form verbs from nouns, indicating the act of making or causing something
meanings.sent1: The addition of -eng changes the noun into a verb.
meanings.sent2: In this case, the -eng at the end shows the action of creating.
meanings.sent3: The -eng at the end of the word gives it a new purpose.
meanings.sent4: With the -eng, the noun transforms into an action word.
meanings.sent5: The meaning of the noun shifts with the addition of -eng.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form adjectives from nouns, indicating the material or substance from which something is made
meanings.sent1: The -eng in this word tells us what the object is made of.
meanings.sent2: By adding -eng, the noun describes the material used in making it.
meanings.sent3: The noun becomes more specific with the inclusion of -eng.
meanings.sent4: The adjective formed with -eng highlights the composition of the item.
meanings.sent5: You can identify the material by looking at the noun with -eng.
